si.title: දයාසිරි දිවුරුම් දුන්නේ පක්ෂ මූලස්ථානය ඉදිරිපිට දිවුරුම් දුන්නේය
body_lines: පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්රී දයාසිරි ජයසේකර මහතා පක්ෂ මූලස්ථානය ඉදිරිපිට බලගත්තේය.
පක්ෂ මූලස්ථානයට ඇතුළු වීමට පොලිසිය ඉඩ නොදුන් බැවින් ඔහු දිවුරුම් දුන්නේය.

en.title: Dayasiri was sworn in in front of party headquarters
body_lines: Parliamentarian Dayasiri Jayasekera took office in front of the party headquarters that he would hold the post of General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party.
He was sworn in as the police did not allow him to enter the party headquarters.

summary_lines: Dayasiri Jayasekera, a Parliamentarian, was sworn in as the General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party at its headquarters. Despite police preventing his entry initially, he successfully assumed the position.
